comments.comment: Been Waiting for these to go on sale! Finallyyyy!
Surprised they re-released these! Took 9 months but im finally getting em
Picked these up off this site and I must say that Im buying all my shoes from here!
Not the best looking shoes but definetly my favourite lounge around shoes for comfort.
This is actually the best place to find Jordans. Looked all over for these and this might be the only site that has every size too! Just wow!
Already sold out of my size and these are a new release ):
